data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ug2tdr4nOrIQ7kNvgEs9Am6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgzPHcwq2bXVvKxV5w4DjdA4kdG5t_CFi2TB3lqZiW3A&oe=66D3128C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5NrZRP_lEgUQ7kNvgF6UtJ6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAfOXcFhDs_cb2rNE-bAeM0X53MzP7-zCIoB0bUBiXfSg&oe=66D3109F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=68dCFII_4kcQ7kNvgEIIXII&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBegssV76231PZyKJCs6Q0cWW-oEGaTq85DpXNjIsKc1Q&oe=66D2F5F1)
